QuestData.Title: Lao-Chin and Serevex
QuestData.Description: Lao-Chin is facing off against the leader just above the entrance in the tree, on the north side of Sik'vess. He is to bring back the second crystal that we need to get into the mantid tunnel.$B$BGo there and lend him your aid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Serevex with the aid of Lao-Chin the Iron Belly.
QuestData.RewardText: We have the second crystal then. Good.
